captions.text:
'No man can live his life
without a love and a friend,..

..some friendships end
in childhood itself.'

1980, a batch of students leaving
college after finishing studies...
Let me introduce you to them.
Listen, give me your autograph.
Why?

Don't know when
we'll meet again in life.

Our friendship will not end
with autographs,..

Friendship doesn't mean
having fun together.

..but sharing joys and grieves
all the life together.

Even after the college, we'll keep
in touch with each other.
It's easier said than done.
I'm telling it from my heart.
Who can stop us from meeting?
We can meet how far we may be.
We'll continue to meet each other.

If the canteen closes, we'll have
to eat bun and bananas.
Dear friends..

Get down from the stage!
- Come down!
You all have children..
..still haven't reformed.

We reformed, so we
became fathers.
If you don't believe, ask them.
Get down.

If you stand there for some more
time you'll start lecturing us.
Okay, so presenting..
..Junior Prabhu Deva.
"Darling, competition."
"O darling."
"Darling, competition."
"O darling."
Superb!
My daughter is no less.

"No matter if there's a thunderstorm
or earthquake."

"Sky never comes down.
Love never fails."
"O darling, talk to me lovingly."

"We both will unite.
Sing and dance."

"Happiness will be ours."
- Wonderful.

Let's  go and have food or
you'll have to eat banana chips.
Okay, pal, he'll never change.

Friends, my business deal is done,
I'll settle down in Switzerland.

I'm shifting my office to Delhi,
I'll stay there only.

We were meeting since
we lived nearby,..

..will it be possible to meet
if you go faraway places?

Like we met today,
we'll meet in future too.

Where there's a will,
there's a way.

Even the inflation can't stop us.
What say? - Yes.
Prabhas, come here.
What's it uncle?
You dance excellent.

Which class?
- Seventh class, uncle.

Is it? How many
times did you fail?
Uncle ruined my dignity.
Second year in seventh class.

Stop dancing and start
concentrating on studies.

Who are you? Just leave us.
What is this?
Help!
Hey! Who are you?
What's your name?
Prabhas. - Your phone number?

Excuse me, please.
- Hello handsome.

Prabhas.. - I'll pick you up at
9 am tomorrow, okay?
What's the matter?
I love you.
Was it a joke?
Sorry, I didn't want to hurt you.
You don't look in a good mood.

What's the matter, dear?
I have the same problem from you.
You don't tell me anything.
Brother.. do you know?

Building contract has been
bagged by Rao's Company.
Now, we'll have to beg.

Do you know
who I was talking to?

I was talking to my
beloved daughter.
Dear, if I come late home..

..then don't feel bad and
don't cry. Bye.
Don't worry until I'm here.

Be relaxed. No one will
know anything.
I am sure. Yes, sir.

I think, there was a slight mistake,
but not anything major.

There'll be a little commotion,
but we'll handle it. And this..
Lawyer..
..don't talk in English.
I know Hindi.

I can understand
you are stressed.

You don't want to be
more stressed, do you?

Tell me.. how much you
took from them?
No sir, I didn't take anything.

Really sir. Swear by you. Trust me..
- I can bear a loss of 30 crores.
I can earn it in 3 days.

But you betrayed me,
I won't tolerate it.

Tell me, how much you took
from them? - Sir, forgive me.

I'll not repeat
such mistake again.

Sir, I'm telling the truth.
Leave me.

You'll repeat it only when
you are alive.
When I commit something..

..then I don't listen to my father,
let alone me.

The one who you can see
on the screen is..
..is my only son's only mother.

Like a dog's tail can
never be straightened..

..the same way, she can
never learn English.

The news that I'm going to
give you, don't get scared..

These days' parents
can't control their children.

Your children celebrated their
farewell party on the road.
There was a traffic jam.

Even I was stuck in
the same traffic..

..so news got delayed
by two hours.

Prabhas, what's this?
You're ruining our name.

Going to college to sing,
dance, and have fun.
Let your father come.

That's all for now.
Remember, we show the truth.

The truth that you want to know.
India News.
Hello? - Where are you?
Did you see TV today?

Yes, I'll come home
and watch it.

Your son is singing and dancing
on the road and ruining our name.

Shut up! I'm already tensed,
disconnect the line.
Stop.. stop... come out.
Come out!

I'm not sitting alone in the car.
Sir is sitting behind.
I don't care. - Sir is sitting..

Why are you shouting so much?
- Sir, come out.
This jinx fool came here again.

Had I warned a dog not to come,
it wouldn't have come here.

If you feel shy, then don't come
here again.
Who is it?
He is my father.

What's this father?
Travelling in a Mercedes.
Whose is it? - Shut up!
Belongs to a client. - Client's.

You go, tell sir, I'll call him.
- Okay sir.

Even he'll come with us?
- Let's go.

Uncle, we're going for a birthday
party, if you come, we won't get food.

We'll meet at our den.
- Leave uncle in a jungle..

You leave that to me.
- Let's go.
You leave.
Hi mummy.

Hero's dad. What is this?
Your son is dancing in public..

..they showed on TV. Everybody is
calling me seeing that.

Police was chasing him.
I won't be in this house.

Oh mother! Please don't kill us
with your English.
You shut up!

Is this the way to talk
to your mother?
Bloody fool!

When you passed in interns,
we celebrated at home..

When in college, you created a
chaos in district..

..do you've to make it a state wide
issue if you pass graduation?
I don't know.. - Stay quiet!

In which channel?
- Gemini TV.

Don't you've any shame?
Just one Gemini TV only?
Do you want to make it to NDTV?
BBC?
CNN?

Oh God, father and son
will tarnish my image.

How is my performance?
- Wonderful!
I thought you'd lash me with a belt.

I'd have done it, but if I did so,
pant will come down.
I love you, dad!

NDTV, BBC? Family honor
is going to dogs because of them.
Rajeshwari.. - Yes?
Today was last day in his college.

..birthdays, anniversaries
come every year..

..but farewell day
comes only once in life.
He is a kid. Let him enjoy.
Tomato, try to understand.

I've become a cauliflower now.
- Cauliflower?
No.

Who said so..
- Shut up, have some shame..
I am coming. Who is it?

Hello! How are you my friend.
- Hey!
Pal, how are you?

Hi Aunty! - What made you
come here all of a sudden?

I was here to collect my
daughter's MBBS certificate.
Your house was on the way..

..so I thought I'll have tea and
snacks for free. - Sure.

Uncle, where's brother?
Not be seen.
Prabhas! - I'm in the bathroom.
He's in the bathroom.

I think he doesn't like girls
in my college..

..so he's not coming to meet me too.
- Like father like son!
In front of everyone..
Hello?

Listen, Vishwanath has called you
from Switzerland.
What?
Hey you, Vishwanath.

What did you say? You all are
coming to India in 2 days?

Okay, tell me if you
need anything.
Hello?
You knew it, didn't you?

Yes, we all friends are having a

No, usually I arrange
the meeting, right?

We wanted to surprise you,
last time everyone didn't turn up.
This time, it's special..
We all are meeting after 10 years.
Not only us, our families too.

All we friends will
remember our college days..
..we will have fun.
"We'll never give up this friendship."
Why are you getting so emotional, son?
Because I am happy.
For what?
Aren't your friends my friends?

Rajesh, Geeta, Sita, Pandu,
Nandini, Raghu, Seenu, Gujju..

Even we are going to meet
after 10 years.

We are going to have fun!
- Don't see them.
Why?

Because, we've to make
many arrangements.

So, you've to handle all the work.
So, go from here immediately.

Uncle, please. - What is he doing?
- Prabhas..
Do as uncle tells you.
What do I tell him?

Don't refuse. You should take me
for shopping.
Always troublesome.
What are you playing?
Guitar, what else?
Fool, guitar is above and not down.

Our friend is returning
after 10 years.

We'll meet friend.
We'll have fun.

There will be liquor and
chicken to eat.
Who is inviting you?
No entry for short people.
We don't need invitation.

We came into this world
without anybody inviting us.

We will surely join you
for picnic.
Don't talk about our height.

If you are tall,
we are a little shorter.

Shorter.. - He got stuck
on shorter.
Don't overact.
We bind with Nandini's oath.
Okay, wear nice clothes.
Prabhas..
Did Nisha propose to you yesterday?

She did. So what?
- What is the story?
Are you making a film?

You're asking me story. I love
Nandini, how can I agree to Nisha?

We're in trouble,
she tried to commit suicide.
What? Suicide?

Yes, she's in hospital now.
Her condition is very serious.
Oh God, this girl is..

Nisha..
- Where are you going?
Hospital.

If you go there, you'll land in soup.
Her father is a villain.

Your betterment lies in
hiding yourself somewhere.

Why should I go? - His daughter
tried to commit suicide.

If you go there,
he will ring your bell.

Hello? - Prabhas, I'm going
to the railway station..

..your mother and Prasanna

After they are done with shopping,
get them to the station. - Okay.

Listen, we were supposed to
go to Vizag tomorrow, isn't it?
Let's leave today.
Please, come.
Tell me where is Prabhas?

My marriage has been fixed.
- Why are you hitting me?

Leave us.
- Don't hit me.
Leave me, brother.
Tell us.
How much is this?
Yes, tell me.

Villain has sent goons
to thrash you.

They are beating everyone,
I managed to escape somehow..
..I took a video of them..
..I'm sending you MMS,..

..if you want to live,
see that MMS.
I shall disconnect.
Please, come.
Walk faster. - Okay.

They're waiting for us
in railway station. - Okay.
Where's brother?
How is it? - Yuck! No!
No, mother, shall I buy this?
Forget it. - Okay.
He is following us.
Buy genuine stuff.
Take it.

My purse is torn.
Shall I buy a new one?

No, we'll reach the station first.
We are getting late. - Okay.
My sweet son..
Come to that shop. - Okay.
Selling for cheap!

If you don't pay money,
then you can't sit here.
Brother! Do you want this?

These shopkeepers are too much.
What's the price of this?
What happened?

He makes his parents proud.
Move side.

What do you want?

Auto. - Come, sit.

Yes, aunt. - Take them to

Okay, sir.

I heard, you love

If you love them,
then you must come.
Boss, don't talk, kill them.
What did you say your name was?
Prabha.. - Oh, Prabhaskar?

Look Prabhas,

She always hides everything in heart,..

commit suicide,..

Nisha is really lucky to have

Love and marriage are

Why don't you like my daughter?
Tell me, what does she lack in?

Because, my heart
is not with me.

20 days and Rs. 20 lakhs,

Rahman, Mani Sharma and Devisri.

Listen, hope there won't be
any problem.

Shut up.
- Your voice is good.

Give me such

By the way,
he is never ready..

They would've eaten

Let them freshen up.

Who amongst you is

Victory!

You want to eat?

Boys, still 4 days

Practice.
- Oh.

Michael Jackson had

Hitler committed suicide

Boys, get in.

Listen, go fast.

Go slow.
Hey. She's going away.

Take left.

You idiot.

Stop man!

Prabhas, if she's gone

Go left.

You idiot.
Hey. Come on, move fast.
Sorry, boss.

Hey man, watch your..

Hey, stop! Hey!
My dear friends..

Come on, let's move.

He has already

..and now He..

Sebastian and Mary, have come here

Oh God.
Will you accept..

Oh no.

Father!

Please don't

I apologized to you.
What else should I do?

Please father,
give me one more chance.
Never. - Let's play toss.
Please father, listen to me.

I beg of you. - Don't touch my feet,

Father, never hide anything from

Therefore, I confess to you.
So soon?

Friends in the party told me one

How'd anyone let go

You drank liquor,

What happened then?

So, I drank the whole bottle.

That's why I was late to church.
Father.

You brought shame

Don't come here again, the other

Take off the sacred dress

Father, stop.

Father, he's being so rude.
Please, father.
Stop, father.
Listen to me.

How to get started?
She's so beautiful.

Superb. What a face.
Beautiful. Absolutely unique.
Mind blowing.

Can I.. can I sit here?
Excuse me, sir. - Yes.
Isn't she pretty?

She looks like an angel.

Once I look at a person,

God has made

We need to practice.

Among us, only Prabhas can sing,

Chorus?

Okay.
Guru.

STD?

S.P.B?

Sir, where is your feet?

Give me a chance to sing.

No, don't touch my feet.

Sir, my music..

Indian heroine in Switzerland.

Prabhas was practicing

Who is that girl?

You..

We'll show you

That girl will say

That girl will say..

Sir.

Darling, I'm hurt..

she is my life.
Isn't it, sir?
Yes.
Don't cry. Let's go.
